paragraph.heading: 1Metric management
paragraph.paragraph:
The user interface provides tools for handling metrics, that is reordering, editing, deleting or importing a set of metrics just by clicking on button
/images/eiffelstudio/icons/icon_select_metrics_color.gif in the metric tool. And then, users can either handle their own defined metrics or import a set of metric definitions from a metric definition record, found in another file than their own one.
